sentences.en: " Well, you could -- you could -- it's a good plantation.
sentences.cn: " 喏, 你可以 ---- 你可以 ---- 那是个上好的种植园呢.

sentences.en: After all these terrible things, we arrived in York River in Virginia, and our plantation.
sentences.cn: 经过这一切可怕的事情以后, 我们终于到达了维基尼亚的约克河, 来到了我们的垦地.

sentences.en: But a stillness as of death hung over the plantation.
sentences.cn: 可是农场上笼罩着一片死一般的寂静.

sentences.en: His father - in - law is a plantation manager.
sentences.cn: 他 岳父 是个种植园经营者.

sentences.en: Indeed, in may regions " forestry " is synonymous with " plantation culture ".
sentences.cn: 事实上, 在许多地区 “ 林业 ” 就是 “ 森林栽培 ” 的同义语.

sentences.en: It was this plantation that had so annoyed Charlie Slatter.
sentences.cn: 使得查理·斯拉特大为气恼的就是这片苗圃.

sentences.en: Later outplant the seedlings in a replicated permanent test plantation.
sentences.cn: 以后苗木出圃栽植成重复的永久性试验林.

sentences.en: Not all plantation work has been masculinized.
sentences.cn: 种植园里的工作并非全是些男性化的工作。

sentences.en: The plantation of Munster had for the time but a limited success.
sentences.cn: 芝斯特的殖民事业,在当时仅取得极为有限的成就.

sentences.en: The plantation owner has possessed himself of a vast piece of land.
sentences.cn: 这个种植园主把大片土地占为己有.

sentences.en: The plantation owner was making a good profit on a small investment.
sentences.cn: 种植园主可以用少量投资获得高利.

sentences.en: Their letters might be intercepted by the Yankees and bring trouble upon the plantation as well.
sentences.cn: 他们的信可能会被北方佬截取,给农场带来麻烦.

sentences.en: There sugar - beet plantation areas were expanded to 176000 hectares.
sentences.cn: 他们的甜菜种植面积增加到176000公顷.

sentences.en: There were things that changed on the plantation.
sentences.cn: 庄园里有些东西变了样.

sentences.en: This is the deed to John's plantation.

words.tran_cn: 工厂，车间；植物；设备；庄稼
种植机，[农机] 播种机；种植者；种植园主；耕作者；殖民者
种植园,大农场;移民,殖民地

trans.tran_cn: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的
种植园，大农场，栽植，<史>殖民，殖民地
trans.tran_en: a large area of land in a hot country, where crops such as tea, cotton, and sugar are grown
